Then you started googling your way to detoxing your home and the info you got was all doom and gloom. Well, get ready mama because this is not like your typical, crunchy mom, non toxic living podcast. Why? Because this is a judgement free zone. I'm here showing up for you to do this differently. It's time for us to dig in living a non toxic home made easy! Grab your kombucha and let's do this!
